text: Smile for Me may refer to: ;Films *Smile for Me, a 2007 Australian short film by Anna Fraser ;Music *Smile for Me (album), 1974 studio album by country music singer Lynn Anderson *"Smile for Me" (Lynn Anderson song), 1974 single by Lynn Anderson *"Smile for Me" (The Tigers song), song composed by Barry and Maurice Gibb in 1968, and made popular by the Japanese band The Tigers *"Smile for Me" (Massari song), 2005 single by Canadian singer Massari and featuring the rapper Loon
title: Smile for Me
